channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText™ -- Exceed Turbo X
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText™ -- Exceed Turbo X

item.title: CVE-2023-38535|2024-08-02T17:46:56.001Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- exceed%20turbo%20x
item.description: Use of Hard-coded Cryptographic Key vulnerability in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting versions 12.5.1 and 12.5.2. The vulnerability could compromise the cryptographic keys.

item.title: CVE-2023-38536|2024-08-02T17:46:55.999Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- exceed%20turbo%20x
item.description: HTML injection in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting version 12.5.1. The vulnerability could result in Cross site scripting.

item.title: CVE-2023-38534|2024-08-02T17:46:55.711Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- exceed%20turbo%20x
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting versions 12.5.0 and 12.5.1. The vulnerability could allow disclosure of restricted information in unauthenticated RPC.

item.title: CVE-2023-38536|2024-06-04T17:28:28.837Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- exceed%20turbo%20x
item.description: HTML injection in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting version 12.5.1. The vulnerability could result in Cross site scripting.

item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting versions 12.5.0 and 12.5.1. The vulnerability could allow disclosure of restricted information in unauthenticated RPC.

item.description: Use of Hard-coded Cryptographic Key vulnerability in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting versions 12.5.1 and 12.5.2. The vulnerability could compromise the cryptographic keys.
